title: Can TSM beat Besiktas?
body: After the tough loss to Fnatic do you think TSM can bounce back and get their first (and mabye only) win of this tournament?

replies.body: more Sjokz.....less TSM tears please
If it isn't the TSM fanboys when they win its the EU fanboys when they win. It was one game, and sitting here on this rather uncomfortable MSI seat, I can tell you. This tournament isn't over yet.
Well let's think about it, what else do people from Europe have to get excited about?
Swedish Chicks.
Taylor Swift > Swedish chicks.
I approve this message.

> [{quoted}](name=Nucleophilic atk,realm=NA,application-id=9hBQwnEU,discussion-id=jaGIKEyh,comment-id=0000000000010000,timestamp=2015-05-07T22:43:50.152+0000)
>
> Taylor Swift > Swedish chicks.

You prefer to masturbate to Taylor Swift than actually try scoring a date with someone? Cos I think Swedish people would prefer to get actual girlfriends than think about how hot a popstar is.

Uhm, I have a gf that I'm lucky enough to have had move in with me. I fail to see how you think somebody thinking a singer is > Swedish chicks is said person not preferring to get an "actual girlfriend". I think you might have to explain your business major logic a little bit better, because I don't understand stupid.

> [{quoted}](name=Nucleophilic atk,realm=NA,application-id=9hBQwnEU,discussion-id=jaGIKEyh,comment-id=000000000001000000020000,timestamp=2015-05-08T00:22:28.272+0000)
>
> Uhm, I have a gf that I'm lucky enough to have had move in with me. I fail to see how you think somebody thinking a singer is > Swedish chicks is said person not preferring to get an "actual girlfriend". I think you might have to explain your business major logic a little bit better, because I don't understand stupid.

I'm just saying there's not much point in saying Taylor Swift is better than Swedish girls when you can actually have experiences with Swedish girls, but you can't with Taylor Swift.

If you said American girls were better than Swedish ones then sure but what you said basically came across as "I'd rather watch porn of hot women than have relationships with maybe slightly less hot women".
Taylor Swift is still > Swedish chicks.

Waiting on Picks and Bans to start...STOP TALKING QUICKSHOT!

http://lostinstockholm.com/wp-content/uploads/2009/08/swedishgirls1.jpg
I win. (2nd from the left)
Real Football.

If there is no point on the ball, there is no point in the game.

# #rekt
They make cool taxi p*rn videos.
everything is possible!

Looks like your guess come true, lol.
Poor TSM...
Lol..well lots of these TSM fan(boy)s are not keeping it real. Of course they are underdogs against SKT and EDG but everyone here expected them to handily beat FNC and AHQ.

Everyone in NA dont want they lose lol. At least they are on behalf of NA, and now they lost to EU and LMS.
Just hope that EDG will give a little mercy on the host. Maybe they can give a win for TSM...
Well to be honest TSM is a good team. They might actually be able to beat EDG even though it is highly questionable in their current shape but before yesterday I would have given them a fair chance.

> [{quoted}](name=Danielas Kitten,realm=EUW,application-id=9hBQwnEU,discussion-id=jaGIKEyh,comment-id=0003000000010000,timestamp=2015-05-08T22:33:21.016+0000)
>
> Well to be honest TSM is a good team. They might actually be able to beat EDG even though it is highly questionable in their current shape but before yesterday I would have given them a fair chance.

I dont say they are not good, just EDG too strong to beat... Even after their lost yesterday, I still think SKT and EDG are on the same level.

> [{quoted}](name=Danielas Kitten,realm=EUW,application-id=9hBQwnEU,discussion-id=jaGIKEyh,comment-id=00030000,timestamp=2015-05-08T22:15:51.690+0000)
>
> Lol..well lots of these TSM fan(boy)s are not keeping it real. Of course they are underdogs against SKT and EDG but everyone here expected them to handily beat FNC and AHQ.

Ummmm.. wasn't this thread about BJK??? (I mean before it got hijacked by Taylor Swift and swedish girls?)

What do FNC and AHQ have to do with any of that?

I made the assumption the match vs Besiktas could turn out to be TSM's only victory of the tournament which might actually come true now unless they beat EDG. And that is because they lost to AHQ and FNC as I was kinda expecting.

> [{quoted}](name=Danielas Kitten,realm=EUW,application-id=9hBQwnEU,discussion-id=jaGIKEyh,comment-id=0003000000000000,timestamp=2015-05-08T22:19:30.382+0000)
>
> I made the assumption the match vs Besiktas could turn out to be TSM's only victory of the tournament which might actually come true now unless they beat EDG. And that is because they lost to AHQ and FNC as I was kinda expecting.

Yea, and where are the tsm fanboys in this thread?

The threads I have read have been pretty critical of tsm. Calling out Dyrus for basically terrible play, bjerg for questionable picks, santorin for being afk, bad warding, bad team fighting and just generally being bad- even in the 1 game they won. I think the tsm critiques have pretty much been on point.
Well you can see the downvotes I have got on a serious question.
Why is BJK even in this?
Yes. BJK is basically Coast. They are a challenger level team playing against region winners. Very likely to go 0-5.
